name: Bunny Madness Anarchy
description: Bunny Madness Anarchy is a fast-paced, competitive third person shooter. Set in a war-torn civilization of bipedal animals where the madness has taken over. Kill your enemies, rely on teamwork and survive the fight.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(™) i3-4170 CPU @ 3.70GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(™) i5-4590 CPU @ 3.70GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 750 TI or AMD Radeon R7 265 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection
